author: Stephanie Armour
title: Virginia set to expand Medicaid, and other states are following - MarketWatch
text:
Virginia is poised to expand Medicaid after a hard-fought legislative battle, making it one of a growing number of states where there is interest in expanding the program after Republicans failed to repeal the Affordable Care Act last year.
The Virginia General Assembly on Wednesday approved expansion of Medicaid, the state-federal program for the low income. Democratic Gov. Ralph Northam has signaled he will sign the bill, making the state the 33rd to expand Medicaid under the ACA.
...
